{"id":711869308,"lang":"java","time":"2Â weeks","timestamp":1654067988,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/711869308/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check if Number Has Equal Digit Count and Digit Value","memory":"42.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean digitCount(String num) {\n        int[] ar = new int[10];\n        for(char c  : num.toCharArray()){\n            ar[c-'0']++;\n        }\n        for(int i =0 ; i<num.length(); i++){\n            if (ar[i] != Character.getNumericValue(num.charAt(i)))\n                return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-if-number-has-equal-digit-count-and-digit-value"}
